name: Microsoft Help Container File
summary: Learn about .MSHC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MSHC files store help documents created for software applications. The documentation is deployed with software applications as a signed .CAB file that contains MSHC packages.

description: Help package created in the MS Help Viewer 1.x format, which replaces the MS Help 2.x (.HXS) and MS Help 1.x (.CHM) formats; stores help content such as .HTML files, images, and written text; saved in a compressed .ZIP format.
